description: This source file appears to be a PHP script that dynamically generates a user toolbar and status indicators for a web UI. It includes session management, AJAX calls to update status icons, and user-specific options like logout and password change.

methods.name: setTimeout
methods.description: Schedules a function to execute after a specified delay (used here for delaying script execution).

methods.name: ajax
methods.description: Performs asynchronous HTTP (AJAX) requests to update user interface elements with server status.

methods.name: jAlert
methods.description: Custom alert dialog used for logout warning messages.
